author: View All Posts Tony
title: Aregbesola unveils 'Ofada Osun Rice' - Vanguard News
text:
Home » News » Aregbesola unveils ‘Ofada Osun Rice’ Aregbesola unveils ‘Ofada Osun Rice’ On 1:26 pm In News by Tony Comments 
Osun state Governor, Ogbeni Rauf Aregbesola has unveiled ‘Ofada Osun Rice’, a type of Rice produced by the state thereby adding the state among major players in the Nigerian rice market and strengthening rice production in Nigeria. 
Governor Aregbesola who visited the Onilapa Rice Farm Ogbaagba on Tuesday to meet with the farmers reiterated his government’s effort at ensuring adequate food production for self sustenance of Osun state, saying Nigerians must feed themselves. Aregbesola unveils ‘Ofada Osun Rice’ 
Showcasing the harvested rice yesterday, the farmers who partnered with the state of Osun on the project thanked Gov Rauf Aregbesola for his support through the farming season. Aregbesola unveils ‘Ofada Osun Rice’ Aregbesola unveils ‘Ofada Osun Rice’ Osun farmers at the Aregbesola unveiling of ‘Ofada Osun Rice’ Osun farmers at the Aregbesola unveiling of ‘Ofada Osun Rice’
